title: travelplanner: I need assistance in planning a 7-day journey beginning from Louisville, aiming to experience 3 different cities within Florida. The proposed dates are between March 23rd and March 29th, 2022, and I have a new budget of $7,800. (d895d100ef59a81e)

always_included_messages.content: Based on the user's query, make the best travel plan for the user and save it. Do not ask follow-up questions.

chat_history.content: I need assistance in planning a 7-day journey beginning from Louisville, aiming to experience 3 different cities within Florida. The proposed dates are between March 23rd and March 29th, 2022, and I have a new budget of $7,800.

function.name: delegate
function.arguments: {"instructions":"Find the best travel itinerary for a 7-day journey starting from Louisville to three different cities in Florida between March 23rd and March 29th, 2022, with a budget of $7,800. Include transportation, accommodation, and major attractions for each city."}

chat_history.content:
### Travel Itinerary for a 7-Day Journey from Louisville to Florida

#### Budget: $7,800

#### Day 1: March 23, 2022 - Louisville to Orlando
- **Flight**: Louisville to Orlando
  - Flight Number: F3627159
  - Price: $154
  - Departure: 10:01 AM
  - Arrival: 12:27 PM

- **Accommodation in Orlando**:
  - **Private furnished bedroom in Williamsburg**
    - Price: $179 per night
    - Room Type: Private room
    - House Rules: No parties, No smoking, No children under 10
    - Review Rate: 2.0

- **Attractions in Orlando**:
  - SeaWorld Orlando
  - The Wheel at ICON Park
  - Fun Spot America Theme Parks
  - Madame Tussauds Orlando
  - Ripley's Believe It or Not!
  - Universal Orlando Resort
  - Harry P Leu Gardens

#### Day 2-3: March 24-25, 2022 - Orlando
- **Continue exploring attractions in Orlando**:
  - Seuss Landing
  - The Wizarding World of Harry Potter - Diagon Alley
  - The Wizarding World of Harry Potter - Hogsmeade
  - Crayola Experience Orlando
  - SEA LIFE Orlando Aquarium
  - WonderWorks Orlando
  - Universal Studios Florida

#### Day 4: March 25, 2022 - Orlando to Miami
- **Flight**: Orlando to Miami
  - Flight Number: F3670403
  - Price: $50
  - Departure: 5:43 PM
  - Arrival: 6:38 PM

- **Accommodation in Miami**:
  - **Cozy Two-bedroom Apt in a Cute House in Brooklyn!**
    - Price: $99 per night
    - Room Type: Private room
    - House Rules: No children under 10
    - Review Rate: 4.0

- **Attractions in Miami**:
  - Jungle Island
  - Pérez Art Museum Miami
  - Bayfront Park
  - Wynwood Walls
  - Maurice A. Ferré Park
  - Miami Seaquarium

#### Day 5-6: March 26-27, 2022 - Miami
- **Continue exploring attractions in Miami**:
  - Bayside Marketplace
  - Skyviews Miami Observation Wheel
  - Phillip & Patricia Frost Museum of Science
  - Miami Children's Museum
  - Vizcaya Museum & Gardens
  - Miami Walk of Fame
  - Lummus Park

#### Day 7: March 27, 2022 - Miami to Tampa
- **Flight**: Miami to Tampa
  - Flight Number: F3681932
  - Price: $52
  - Departure: 8:44 AM
  - Arrival: 9:43 AM

- **Accommodation in Tampa**:
  - **Bright duplex apartment**
    - Price: $164 per night
    - Room Type: Entire home/apt
    - House Rules: No children under 10
    - Review Rate: 1.0

- **Attractions in Tampa**:
  - The Florida Aquarium
  - Busch Gardens Tampa Bay
  - Adventure Island
  - Henry B. Plant Museum
  - Museum of Science & Industry
  - Tampa Bay History Center

#### Day 8: March 28, 2022 - Tampa
- **Continue exploring attractions in Tampa**:
  - Glazer Children's Museum
  - ZooTampa at Lowry Park
  - Tampa Museum of Art
  - Sulphur Springs Water Tower
  - Congo River Rapids
  - MacDill Park on the Riverwalk

#### Day 9: March 29, 2022 - Tampa to Louisville
- **Flight**: Tampa to Louisville
  - Flight Number: F3963197
  - Price: $203
  - Departure: 11:38 AM
  - Arrival: 1:42 PM

### Summary of Costs:
- **Flights**: $154 + $50 + $52 + $203 = $459
- **Accommodation**:
  - Orlando: $179 x 3 nights = $537
  - Miami: $99 x 3 nights = $297
  - Tampa: $164 x 2 nights = $328
- **Total Accommodation**: $537 + $297 + $328 = $1,162
- **Total Cost**: $459 (flights) + $1,162 (accommodation) = $1,621

### Remaining Budget:
- **Total Budget**: $7,800
- **Spent**: $1,621
- **Remaining**: $6,179

This remaining budget can be used for food, local transportation, and entrance fees to attractions. Enjoy your trip!

chat_history.content:
Your 7-day journey from Louisville to three different cities in Florida has been successfully planned and saved. Here is a summary of your itinerary:

### Day 1: March 23, 2022 - Louisville to Orlando
- **Flight**: Louisville to Orlando
- **Accommodation**: Private furnished bedroom in Williamsburg, Orlando
- **Attractions**: SeaWorld Orlando, The Wheel at ICON Park, Fun Spot America Theme Parks

### Day 2: March 24, 2022 - Orlando
- **Accommodation**: Private furnished bedroom in Williamsburg, Orlando
- **Attractions**: Madame Tussauds Orlando, Ripley's Believe It or Not!, Universal Orlando Resort

### Day 3: March 25, 2022 - Orlando
- **Accommodation**: Private furnished bedroom in Williamsburg, Orlando
- **Attractions**: Harry P Leu Gardens, Seuss Landing, The Wizarding World of Harry Potter - Diagon Alley

### Day 4: March 26, 2022 - Orlando to Miami
- **Flight**: Orlando to Miami
- **Accommodation**: Cozy Two-bedroom Apt in a Cute House in Brooklyn!, Miami
- **Attractions**: The Wizarding World of Harry Potter - Hogsmeade, Crayola Experience Orlando, SEA LIFE Orlando Aquarium

### Day 5: March 27, 2022 - Miami
- **Accommodation**: Cozy Two-bedroom Apt in a Cute House in Brooklyn!, Miami
- **Attractions**: Jungle Island, Pérez Art Museum Miami, Bayfront Park

### Day 6: March 28, 2022 - Miami
- **Accommodation**: Cozy Two-bedroom Apt in a Cute House in Brooklyn!, Miami
- **Attractions**: Wynwood Walls, Maurice A. Ferré Park, Miami Seaquarium

### Day 7: March 29, 2022 - Miami to Tampa
- **Flight**: Miami to Tampa
- **Accommodation**: Bright duplex apartment, Tampa
- **Attractions**: Bayside Marketplace, Skyviews Miami Observation Wheel, Phillip & Patricia Frost Museum of Science

### Day 8: March 30, 2022 - Tampa
- **Accommodation**: Bright duplex apartment, Tampa
- **Attractions**: The Florida Aquarium, Busch Gardens Tampa Bay, Adventure Island

### Day 9: March 31, 2022 - Tampa to Louisville
- **Flight**: Tampa to Louisville
- **Attractions**: Henry B. Plant Museum, Museum of Science & Industry, Tampa Bay History Center

Enjoy your trip!

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.
instructions.title: Instructions

functions.name: submit_day_plan
functions.desc:
Once you have collected information about the trip, call this function once for each day of the trip, starting on day 1.
If a field does not apply for a given day, use "-" to indicate this.
You MUST call this function to save the plan for each query.

current_city.description: The city for this day. If the plan is to travel between two cities, indicate it as "from A to B" (e.g. "from Ithaca to Charlotte").
current_city.title: Current City

transportation.description: e.g. "Flight Number: F3633413, from Ithaca to Charlotte, Departure Time: 05:38, Arrival Time: 07:46"
transportation.title: Transportation

breakfast.description: The name of a restaurant in the city, e.g. "Nagaland's Kitchen, Charlotte"
breakfast.title: Breakfast

attraction.description: Use a ";" to separate different attractions, with each attraction formatted as "Name, City". e.g. "The Charlotte Museum of History, Charlotte;"
attraction.title: Attraction

accommodation.description: e.g. "Affordable Spacious Refurbished Room in Bushwick!, Charlotte"
accommodation.title: Accommodation

chat_history.name: attraction_search

chat_history.content:
### Travel Itinerary for a 7-Day Journey from Louisville to Florida

#### Budget: $7,800

#### Day 1: March 23, 2022 - Louisville to Orlando
- **Flight**: Louisville to Orlando
  - Flight Number: F3627159
  - Price: $154
  - Departure: 10:01 AM
  - Arrival: 12:27 PM

- **Accommodation in Orlando**:
  - **Private furnished bedroom in Williamsburg**
    - Price: $179 per night
    - Room Type: Private room
    - House Rules: No parties, No smoking, No children under 10
    - Review Rate: 2.0

- **Attractions in Orlando**:
  - SeaWorld Orlando
  - The Wheel at ICON Park
  - Fun Spot America Theme Parks
  - Madame Tussauds Orlando
  - Ripley's Believe It or Not!
  - Universal Orlando Resort
  - Harry P Leu Gardens

#### Day 2-3: March 24-25, 2022 - Orlando
- **Continue exploring attractions in Orlando**:
  - Seuss Landing
  - The Wizarding World of Harry Potter - Diagon Alley
  - The Wizarding World of Harry Potter - Hogsmeade
  - Crayola Experience Orlando
  - SEA LIFE Orlando Aquarium
  - WonderWorks Orlando
  - Universal Studios Florida

#### Day 4: March 25, 2022 - Orlando to Miami
- **Flight**: Orlando to Miami
  - Flight Number: F3670403
  - Price: $50
  - Departure: 5:43 PM
  - Arrival: 6:38 PM

- **Accommodation in Miami**:
  - **Cozy Two-bedroom Apt in a Cute House in Brooklyn!**
    - Price: $99 per night
    - Room Type: Private room
    - House Rules: No children under 10
    - Review Rate: 4.0

- **Attractions in Miami**:
  - Jungle Island
  - Pérez Art Museum Miami
  - Bayfront Park
  - Wynwood Walls
  - Maurice A. Ferré Park
  - Miami Seaquarium

#### Day 5-6: March 26-27, 2022 - Miami
- **Continue exploring attractions in Miami**:
  - Bayside Marketplace
  - Skyviews Miami Observation Wheel
  - Phillip & Patricia Frost Museum of Science
  - Miami Children's Museum
  - Vizcaya Museum & Gardens
  - Miami Walk of Fame
  - Lummus Park

#### Day 7: March 27, 2022 - Miami to Tampa
- **Flight**: Miami to Tampa
  - Flight Number: F3681932
  - Price: $52
  - Departure: 8:44 AM
  - Arrival: 9:43 AM

- **Accommodation in Tampa**:
  - **Bright duplex apartment**
    - Price: $164 per night
    - Room Type: Entire home/apt
    - House Rules: No children under 10
    - Review Rate: 1.0

- **Attractions in Tampa**:
  - The Florida Aquarium
  - Busch Gardens Tampa Bay
  - Adventure Island
  - Henry B. Plant Museum
  - Museum of Science & Industry
  - Tampa Bay History Center

#### Day 8: March 28, 2022 - Tampa
- **Continue exploring attractions in Tampa**:
  - Glazer Children's Museum
  - ZooTampa at Lowry Park
  - Tampa Museum of Art
  - Sulphur Springs Water Tower
  - Congo River Rapids
  - MacDill Park on the Riverwalk

#### Day 9: March 29, 2022 - Tampa to Louisville
- **Flight**: Tampa to Louisville
  - Flight Number: F3963197
  - Price: $203
  - Departure: 11:38 AM
  - Arrival: 1:42 PM

### Summary of Costs:
- **Flights**: $154 + $50 + $52 + $203 = $459
- **Accommodation**:
  - Orlando: $179 x 3 nights = $537
  - Miami: $99 x 3 nights = $297
  - Tampa: $164 x 2 nights = $328
- **Total Accommodation**: $537 + $297 + $328 = $1,162
- **Total Cost**: $459 (flights) + $1,162 (accommodation) = $1,621

### Remaining Budget:
- **Total Budget**: $7,800
- **Spent**: $1,621
- **Remaining**: $6,179

This remaining budget can be used for food, local transportation, and entrance fees to attractions. Enjoy your trip!

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.
instructions.title: Instructions

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.
city.title: City

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.
city.title: City

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.
state.title: State

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.
departure_city.title: Departure City

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.
destination_city.title: Destination City

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.
date.title: Date

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.
origin.title: Origin

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.
destination.title: Destination

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.
city.title: City
